name: Shape_getProbabilityTest
description: Unit tests for the getProbability method of the Shape class in the Apache Commons Collections4 library.

test_cases.name: testGetProbabilityWithNegativeNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when the number of items is negative.

test_cases.name: testGetProbabilityWithZeroNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests that the probability is 0.0 when the number of items is zero.

test_cases.name: testGetProbabilityWithValidNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests that the probability is between 0.0 and 1.0 for a valid number of items.

test_cases.name: testGetProbabilityWithMaxNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests that the probability is between 0.0 and 1.0 for the maximum number of items.

test_cases.name: testGetProbabilityWithLargeNumberOfItems
test_cases.description: Tests that the probability is between 0.0 and 1.0 for a large number of items.
